text: Léon Aimé (9 February 1924 – 31 August 2021) was a French politician. He was born in Longeville-sur-Mer, France. He was a Deputy from 1993 until 1997. He was a member of the Union for French Democracy. Aimé died on 31 August 2021 at the age of 97. ==References== Category:1924 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Politicians from Pays de la Loire Category:People from Vendée
title: Léon Aimé
